name: Ali Rezaei
title: Senior Real Estate Agent
bio: With over 10 years of experience in Tehran's real estate market, Ali specializes in luxury properties and investment opportunities. He has successfully closed over 500 deals and is known for his exceptional negotiation skills.

name: Sara Mohammadi
title: Real Estate Consultant
bio: Sara brings 8 years of expertise in residential real estate, with a focus on helping families find their dream homes. She is known for her patience, attention to detail, and deep understanding of Tehran's neighborhoods.

name: Mehdi Karimi
title: Commercial Property Specialist
bio: Mehdi is our commercial property expert with extensive knowledge of Tehran's business districts. He has helped numerous businesses find the perfect location for their operations.

name: Narges Ahmadi
title: Real Estate Advisor
bio: Narges specializes in rental properties and property management. She has built strong relationships with landlords and tenants throughout Tehran, ensuring smooth transactions for all parties.

name: Reza Hosseini
title: Investment Property Expert
bio: Reza focuses on investment properties and has helped numerous clients build their real estate portfolios. His analytical approach and market insights ensure maximum returns for his clients.

name: Fatemeh Kazemi
title: Residential Property Specialist
bio: Fatemeh has a passion for helping people find their perfect home. With 6 years of experience, she has developed an excellent understanding of Tehran's diverse neighborhoods and property types.
